mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mat_out_use ( group_id, hos_id, copy_code, use_code, use_name, wbx_code, spell_code, is_stop , note ) VALUES ( #{group_id}, #{hos_id}, #{copy_code}, #{use_code}, #{use_name}, #{wbx_code}, #{spell_code}, #{is_stop}, #{note} )
